the most awesome wind ensemble song we have ever played! http://www.thevine.net/hartregiment/Wind%20Ensemble4.html its called "Spin" and we played it my freshman year. i think we did a VERY good job at it. its one of my favorite songs we have played.

i thought i should just give you all a smile today: the most embarrassing moment i have ever had was in 8th grade... ::flashback:: i was walking down the outside hallways of our school while chewing gum to relieve myself in the bathroom. and at that precise moment, i happened to see my all-time-crush at the end of the hallway walking toward me. i started freaking out and didnt know what to do (lil self-conscious me). i quickly devised a plan to get him to look at me and actually notice me...and that plan was to blow a big bubble with my gum and pop it all sexy-like. lol! welp, the time came to blow that blubble, and he actually saw me starting to blow that sexy-bubble...i blew the perfect bubble and was about to pop it when the wind started to blow. my hair had suddenly gotten a mind of its own and blew into my sexy-bubble. i was a sticky mess with so much hair stuck in the bubble gum and my face that i could barley see anything. the only thing i could see was my all-time-crush's face bursting with laughter as he passed by me. embarrassing, i know. but i seemed to get over this traumatizing experience just fine. lol! this is Shannon signing out. -Shannon

i am an early bird. im telling you! welp, nothing really interesting happened this morning..yet. my dad wants me to go out to breakfast this morning with him, so i was told from my older sister Christine. so, he is supposed to come by and pick us up soon...but the thing is, that he never called us up to actually tell us he was coming down...I DONT GET IT! lol oh well...i'll tell him im going to the beach today or something. cuz i think i actually am going to today! yay! for anyone who actually reads my site, who loves the beach?

hi everyone-who-wishes-to-read-this-blog-about-my-life! this is my first ever post and yes, i am a marching bando, so try to refrain from calling me names (ie: band geek and all that fun stuff. yesterday i went to Six Flags and i went on "X" for the first time...and it was SOOO awesome!!! i love it! has anyone here ever gone on it?..let alone even heard of it? its coo. i will post pics and other stuff when i get the hang of this! peace out. the ugly one, Shannon
